description: man wearing overalls, standing in a small fishing boat, holding up a net; slightly blurry image; grasses on both banks; trees at horizon
inscription:
Inscription

on back of mount, in pencil: [This is an original / Doris Ulmann photo / from the John Jacob / Niles Collection. / Rena Niles / Nov. 3, 1990], [L83C (circled)] and [475 (circled)]; on back of mount, in pink pencil: [1073]
title: Fisherman, Near Brookgreen Plantation, Murrells Inlet, South Carolina
